AI Description: umi_tools is a software package that provides a comprehensive set of tools for processing Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs) in next-generation sequencing data, particularly for single-cell RNA-seq datasets. It offers functionalities for deduplicating reads, performing read mapping, and processing BAM files containing UMIs.
Core Features: Read Deduplication Based On Umis, Single-Cell RNA-Seq Data Processing, Adapting Bam Files Containing Umis, Read Mapping & Quality Control
General Tags: Umi Processing, Next-Generation Sequencing, Single-Cell RNA-Seq
